metadata.synopsis: Iron Throne voice system annoucning that a heat breach has been detected in one of the corridors and that it is closing the airlock doors to prevent fire from spreading.
metadata.how_to_trigger: When one of the heat detector objects is destroyed by fire, this plays on them as a system announcement of what happened.

0.speaker: Heat Detector, Heat Detector, Heat Detector, Heat Detector, Heat Detector, Heat Detector, Heat Detector, Heat Detector
0.context: NodeContext: you're a magi-tech automated tannoy system in an evil mage's lair - the hypenated speech is you malfunctioning
